Header: 98,000 drug offenders taken into custody in the year 2018
Content: Minister Thalatha Athukorala has revealed that 98,000 drug offenders have been taken into custody in the year 2018 while the number of drug offenders apprehended in the past one and a half months was 11,000. She made this revelation participating in a function held at Temple Trees. The annual sessions of the Schools Inter Active Collective organized by the Rotary Club for the 28th occasion was held at Temple Trees under the auspices of Minister Thalatha Athukorale. A group including members of the Rotary Club and officials joined in the occasion.
